title: Mega Gnar made of clay!
body: Im really excited about the outcome of my project. Ive always loved working with clay, and hope to continue as soon as possible :)    I'd like to see what Riot and the community thinks about this piece!

replies.body: I'm a huge sucker for sculpture and this is pretty cool considering the materials. Did you use any specific kind of clay? Sculpty? Play-Doh? I have to know!
Just 100% handmolded using red clay. And i would love to create more things, but i dont have materials at home :(
If you're looking for materials, you can usually get basic clays/molding agents pretty cheap at art supply stores. I'd love to see you make more stuff!
Surely id love to make more,  i can get the materials,  but i cant fire the clay without access to a kiln. :/

> [{quoted}](name=Fist Me Senpai,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=EeoBY1Hu,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2015-02-27T08:20:13.406+0000)
>
> Surely id love to make more,  i can get the materials,  but i cant fire the clay without access to a kiln. :/

Perhaps you could try air dry? I know I have a lot of higher quality air dry clay, but I haven't had much luck with it yet.
Wow this is awesome!! nice work :O!! I've always wanted to sculpt but I just don't have the patience D:
I hate Gnar, but I appreciate the effort that went into this.
Thanks!  (I dont like Gnar that much either ) XD
Really cool :D You should do more clay sculptures of LoL champions or things from LoL (*cough* poro *cough*) Keep up the great work dude! :)
